bill.summary:
Avionic Students Housing Act
This bill allows an airport, school, or other airport operator to provide housing on the non-aeronautical area grounds of an airport for students enrolled in an accredited avionic program. The bill defines an avionic program as leading to a degree, certification, or qualifications for a career as a pilot, mechanic, air traffic controller, airline support personnel, or other avionics-related field.
